title: Temples of Old Energy
aboutArtist:
For over a decade Jimmy Duda has been a visual storyteller, senior concept artist, and art director for a multitude of media, including film, streaming services, architectural visualizations, and commercials.

He is an active member of the Visual Effects Society and worked on projects such as Shang Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings, Wheel of Time, Guardians of the Galaxy 2, Black Widow, The Suicide Squad, and many more.

Jimmy is the creator of ‘Symbiont World’, an ongoing series of eco-futuristic, solarpunk artworks, that explore a unique, post-apocalyptic, yet hopeful and inviting world.

The series has been exhibited at the digital art festival ‘Digitale-Düsseldorf’ in 2021 and at the ‘Adobe Behance Dribble’ conference in 2016.
